description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/04/2006

Stephanie confronts Brooke about what happened with Ridge. Brooke tells Stephanie that she has decided to quit Forrester Creations.  Ridge enters to hear this news and he begs her to not to quit. A press conference is held announcing Nick the new CEO of Marone Industries. Later, Nick tells Jackie that he is glad Brooke chose him and that will be the end of all of this drama.
